channel.title: CacheDownloader Help
channel.description:
Can't really explain but whenever i put my cache to download it does this and freezes.
[img]http://i58.tinypic.com/2hyexqp.png[/img]
Any suggestions? really need help :/
Could it be something in my cache?

item.title: CacheDownloader Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

twinkiefromsparta:

Thank you so much man, it worked! c: Doyou mind if you can give me your skype incase i need anymore help? would be greatly appreciated. tysm for helping

It’s on my profile.

item.title: CacheDownloader Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“twinkiefromsparta, post:7, topic:543670”]My direct link to the cache is this
https://www.dropbox.com/meta_dl/eyJzdWJfcGF0aCI6ICIiLCAidGVzdF9saW5rIjogZmFsc2UsICJzZXJ2ZXIiOiAiZGwuZHJvcGJveHVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsICJpdGVtX2lkIjogbnVsbCwgImlzX2RpciI6IGZhbHNlLCAidGtleSI6ICJhZ3N4bWRjd3M1bmVjZHAifQ/AAOD4ebX4jr95Hsup9TQrYyT_cLq-rmAFwl5UmsbMDtYzA?dl=1

But whenever i change the https://dropbox.com to https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com

invalid link

made all of my links direct and i got this

http://prntscr.com/3q25m5[/quote]
That’s really odd because I took your link, and modified it with the dropboxusercontent and it started downloading just fine…

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/agsxmdcws5necdp/Born2brid.cacheV6.zip
^that’s the link I made/used. It downloads instantly when I go to it.

the only link you should be changing is the link in the cachedownloader…

Read full topic

made all of my links direct and i got this

item.description:

twinkiefromsparta:

Does the cache link have to be a direct link?

Yes… The code doesn’t have anything to “click” any of the links that would load on a web page…

item.title: CacheDownloader Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

In your file, change the “https://www.dropbox.com” (yes, only that one part)
to
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com

item.title: CacheDownloader Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Post the cachedownloader code, and make sure you zipped the file correctly, and have a valid link.

[quote=“b00mz1029, post:1, topic:543678”]Maybe your internet is just that bad…

Just kidding but move this to the Client section and people will help you out.[/quote]
It’s better for you to report the topic and in the report box tell the moderators what section it belongs in. As they have the power to physically move topics, while OP can only make new ones.

Read full topic
